name: APeacefulDeath
0:
”Alexa, open peacefully dying”
”What should I do to make the most of life”
”Give me a fun fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peacefully dying
des: Alexa gives you advice on how to deal with the idea of death and how to make the most of your life. You can ask how to make arrangements (for your passing), how to make the most of your life, or for some "fun" facts. Requires nothing more than Alexa herself.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
